website_summaries.verdict: The Diadora Maracana L promises comfort and performance with its ultra-soft, full-grain calfskin leather upper. With the majority of reviews, the leather was proven to provide straight out of the box comfort. Even the wide-footed players were impressed with its accommodating fit. On the flip side, it was also deemed to have a large fit for the narrow-footed and an arguable construction quality. Overall, this soccer cleat is highly recommended for the wide-footed players who consider comfort on top of their priorities.
pros: Based on several comments, the Diadora Maracana L is very comfortable out of the box
Most reviewers were happy to recommend this firm ground soccer cleat to players with wider feet
According to some observers, the leather upper of this low top cleat is very soft
Some users favored the soccer cleat’s lightweight feel when worn on the pitch
This soccer cleat comes at such an excellent price, said some purchasers
cons: A good number of users found the sizing of the Diadora Maracana to be extremely large
Several reviewers criticized the quality of this soccer cleat’s construction
Based on the experience of many users, the sole around the toe area easily pulls off after a few uses

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure you can buy perfect cleats for every foot with good wide support without ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure you can buy perfect cleats for every foot with good wide support without going to a company and having them specially made but if you've got a wide foot...these are a definite recommend. It's so difficult to find cleats for the child that isn't your typical "soccer build" but they exist and someone could corner the market if they would just understand that there's lots of need in the WIDE shoe market. If you're looking for wide...give these a try. They worked for us.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Greif

customer_reviews.title: Excellent model, been wearing them for years
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, if you have a wider-than-normal foot, these are the cleats for you. Great fit, solid quality without needing to break the bank. My one stipulation would be to mention that they have very long laces, so you either have to wrap around your shoe before tying, double-knot, or replace with shorter laces (I wrap around, which actually gives more arch support).
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Nice Boots
customer_reviews.text: Based on the other reviews, I ordered a smaller size than I normally would... It still feels a half size too long, but I'm just going to roll with it. My foot is wide enough that I'd be worried going down another half size. Externally, it appears the same size or even smaller than my tennis shoes! It's the TARDIS shoe -- larger on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Shoe looks good, quality not so good
customer_reviews.text: My son wore them for two weeks of practice and the sole around the toe area totally pulled away from the shoe. I have to say that the customer service was great and they sent us a new pair right away even before I sent the old ones back. As for the durability of the shoe I would give it two stars
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: was too large - had to pay $15 to ship it back - suggest buying locally
customer_reviews.text: was too large - had to pay $15 to ship it back - suggest buying locally
customer_reviews.author: RAV

customer_reviews.title: Too large...
customer_reviews.text: My son has had these cleats before and they were fine. I ordered him a pair through the warehouse deals and received a pair labeled size 9h. So they were not a size 9...they were way off. I think the h means 'half' but these cleats seemed a whole lot bigger. Disappointed I am sending them back because they are nice and a good deal. Unfortunately I don't think he'll be growing into them any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: 5 would fit better. A size 9 wasn't available so I ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if a 9 or 9.5 would fit better. A size 9 wasn't available so I ordered the 9.5 which was too big.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality.
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loved these when he received them but after four weeks of minimal use the sole began to seperate. I went to return/exchange them but the 30 day return window closed two days prior. So now I'm stuck with a $95 pair of cleats with little to no use that he can't wear anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do Not buy!
customer_reviews.text: My son has only worn this soccer cleat for 7 days and the sides have already ripped by the toe....unless you're using it for Less than its expected use; I wouldn't recommend this brand. I am very disappointed in its quality and hold up, or lack there of, for the length of time my son has used them for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my son who has a wide foot and they fit great. The leather shoe is very soft and forgiving. They have been worn right from the box without blisters or any pain.
customer_reviews.author: Aceinthehole2

customer_reviews.title: Great for refs
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoe! I prefer these over my old Copas that I used for refereeing. They feel very light and are great for a wider food (as others have said). You can't beat this price, especially if you need a comfortable, black boot for refereeing.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Boric

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe but runs a half size big. So order a half size smaller than you would normally take
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Breakstone

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these before. These seem a bit tighter around the mid-foot than I remember.
customer_reviews.author: KaBone

customer_reviews.title: Great cleat!
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of the Diadora brand and this cleat lives up to my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: I usually wear a size 10. 5 so I ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 10.5 so I ordered these in size 10 and they were still too big! They were almost a full size too big (like an 11).
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my 14 year old son. They fit one whole size too big. After finally getting the proper fit he liked them After approximately 40 days of receiving them the sole up by the toe has started to separate. We are out of the 30 exchange window so we are stuck trying to fix them ourselves. We have had several other models of Diadora cleats over the years with no problems but this pair is not good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way too big!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes run way too big. we went 1 size down and they were still really big. Not sure why this is the case. Trying another design by Diadora and hoping this will work.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! I'm 47 and play in a recreational league and these are perfect for my needs. They have stretched out a little and feel a touch loose but still comfortable enough to play a couple games in.
customer_reviews.author: Robb Albrecht

customer_reviews.title: 5 but it felt more like a 9/9
customer_reviews.text: These feel about 2 sizes too big. ordered a 7.5 but it felt more like a 9/9.5. Quality shoe if you can get the size right, 4/4.5 stars otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Garza

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too large. I tho it was the same size as T90 but nop. Way too large.
customer_reviews.author: OsmarH

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. I used to wear an 8 in the Adidas Predators but ordered a full size down and they fit perfect. The leather is K-leather anymore but it is still of really good quality once you break the shoes in.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Not as happy as with previous Diadora purchases.
customer_reviews.text: They are a little bitter wider in the forefoot than previous Maracanã's I have purchased. Also, made in China, not Italy.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: I have had Diadora Maracana's before and these do not ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had Diadora Maracana's before and these do not fit as they did. They seem larger in the toe area than the other cleats I have bought of the same size.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Eby

customer_reviews.title: Good traction. However
customer_reviews.text: Good traction. However, way to wide even with two pairs of socks!! Do not recommend for ppl with regular feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe but sized large. Order at least half a size down.
customer_reviews.author: Justin G.

customer_reviews.title: Diadora are the best cleats for me
customer_reviews.text: Diadora are the best cleats for me. I have wide feet and provide so much comfort. These are my 3rd pair. Won't buy any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: one of the toes already kind of separated a bit after first use, common on soccer shoes but still
customer_reviews.author: supamitch

customer_reviews.title: 10 out 10
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic soccer cleat, extremely soft leather, breaks in after one use, highly recommend these cleats, extremely comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: It's stupid large, a I ordered a size 12
customer_reviews.text: It's stupid large, a I ordered a size 12, but it is like 14....not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin B.

customer_reviews.title: Love these cleats and would recommend them if you're on ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these cleats and would recommend them if you're on the fence. Great touch on the ball and grip on the grass.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Speirs

customer_reviews.title: Durability problems
customer_reviews.text: Decent enough shoes--extremely comfortable. They don't last two sessions on artificial grass. I don't know if it has to do with the calf leather (which in my experience is inferior in durability), but they start separating from the sole extremely easily. I understand this may happen eventually, but after a week? Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Chambliss

customer_reviews.title: 5 i like to return that Soccer shoes
customer_reviews.text: HI. es too large i buy another one un amazon 7.5 i like to return that Soccer shoes . how I can return please thankyou very much
customer_reviews.author: jerzy

customer_reviews.title: Nice but run very big buy one size smaller
customer_reviews.text: Nice light weight boot and comfy Size runs very big . I wear a size 9.5 everyday shoe and try a get a little bit more snug fit with my boots so I buy a 9 . Had to buy an 8 with these that fits well but will give a little being leather so go a full size smaller than you normally wear in boot after use will give a bit more play . The H = half size so 8H is 8 and a half .
customer_reviews.author: usbaggies

customer_reviews.title: Tried these for the first time tonight & found them to be the best thing I've had in years in a firm ground ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a wider foot & was previously wearing adidas copa mundial turf shoes. Tried these for the first time tonight & found them to be the best thing I've had in years in a firm ground cleat. The shoes had little-to-no break in time, and my feet feel the best they have in years during & after playing. The only downside is that they ran about a 1/2 size too big, which took a little off my touch.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

product_meta.title: Diadora Mens Maracana L-M Maracana L
product_meta.description: Ultra soft water resistant leather upper Soccer Cleats
